title: Do you think it's okay to let kids play rough with each other? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends. It’s okay for kids to tussle about OUTSIDE and in appropriate ways, and supervised. Like wrestling or football, or hide and seek or stuff like that. If they are slapping each other around, not so much. If one is the aggressor and the other is getting bullied, nonono. My brother used to think it funny to corner me, hold me down and then fart in my face. I felt like he was making a statement. One I had to solve for. Last time he tried it, I made sure the peanut butter that was in my hand made it to the back of his shorts and down his leg. Then I ran to his friends and told them he sharted all over. They never let him live it down.
